name: Anson Aviation
about: Anson Aviation is a professionally run flight school located at KSGR, emphasizing safety and high standards in aviation training. Our courses are FAA-approved under Part 141, ensuring rigorous and consistent training. We offer a "Cleared for Takeoff" private pilot course, a multi-engine add-on rating, and other specialized training programs using state-of-the-art resources like King Schools' online curriculum and Redbird simulators. Our fleet includes reliable Cessna 172 aircraft and Piper PA-44 multi-engine planes. With one-on-one instruction from FAA-certified instructors, we provide a comprehensive and tailored learning experience. Anson Aviation is committed to equipping pilots with the skills necessary for safe and successful flight operations.
